title: update memory and cpu information also in case of failure
message:
update memory and cpu information also in case of failure

Re-try to open /proc/meminfo or /proc/stat in case of failure. This
allows to keep informations updated also if for some strange reason
(race on boot) the first open to one of these file fails.

message:
show many other system informations

Show many other system informations in the clock frame:
 - kernel version string
 - architecture
 - uptime (as reported in /proc/uptime)
 - loadavg (as reported in /proc/loadvg)
 - battery level
 - date and time

title: PicoClock: first version
message:
PicoClock: first version

Implement the clock as a very simple widget that shows a plain text
frame.

The text frame is not updated if the screen is off; this allows to save
power and increase battery lifetime.

Signed-off-by: Andrea Righi <andrea@betterlinux.com>
